ygData.subject: Re: Rarity of lambent stones
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve gotten the stones of giants and griffons so far in West Commons, Lake Rathe and North Karana.  I m sure they all drop them, these are just the places
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Rarity of lambent stones

>Do lambent stones only
>get dropped in specific zones or can they get dropped in any zone with a
>giant or griffin? How often do they get dropped?
>
>Also, can non-bards complete the bard armor quests in order to sell the
>lambent armor pieces?

I've gotten the stones of giants and griffons so far in West Commons, Lake
Rathe and North Karana. I'm sure they all drop them, these are just the
places I've hunted for them. I've even bought two of them for 15pp apiece
on Solusek Ro.

Lambent armor is NOT no drop so someone else can do the quest for you.

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 36 Bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
